mapper.select: select a.hb_c_no, a.userid, b.m_pic, a.b_no, a.hb_comment, to_char(a.writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') writedate from hb_comment a join register b on a.userid=b.userid where b_no=#{param1} order by a.hb_c_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into hb_comment(hb_c_no, userid, hb_comment, b_no) values(hb_comment_sq.nextval, #{userid}, #{hb_comment}, #{b_no})
